    • Method Detail

      • search

        @RequestMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.PagedResources<SearchResult>> search(@RequestParam(value="query",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String query,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="qs",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Boolean quickSearch,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="pageSize",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer size,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="page",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer page,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="records",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Boolean includeRecords,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="containers",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Boolean includeContainers,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="classification",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer classification,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="created",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long createdAtUnix,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="updated",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long updatedAtUnix,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="closed",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long closedAtUnix,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="location",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer location,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="schedule",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer schedule,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="state",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer state,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="type",required=false)
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer type)
        Returns a Response Entity containing a page of HATEOAS PagedResources of SearchResult objects, after performing a quick search or a filtered, full text search with the given parameters. Return page's size and page number are determined by the size and page parameters

        Mapped to '/search', with all parameters as RequestParameters

        Parameters:
        query - the string used as a query for the fulltext search
        quickSearch - Whether or not you want full(fulltext, filtered) or quick(exact) searching
        size - the size of pages you want returned (optional, default 10)
        page - the page number, for the given size (optional, default 0)
        includeRecords - whether or not to include Records in the SearchResults (optional, default true)
        includeContainers - whether or not to include Containers in the Search Results (optional, default true)
        classification - the classification Id to use to filter Records (optional, default null)
        createdAtUnix - the createdAt date value used to filter Records and Containers, unix stamp (optional, default null)
        updatedAtUnix - the updatedAt date value used to filter Records and Containers, unix stamp (optional, default null)
        closedAtUnix - the closedAt date value used to filter Records (optional, default null)
        location - the location Id used to filter Records (optional, default null)
        schedule - the schedule Id used to filter Records (optional, default null)
        state - the state Id used to filter Records (optional, default null)
        type - the type Id used to filter Records (optional, default null)
        Returns:
        Response Entity containing a page of HATEOAS PagedResources of SearchResult objects

      • reload

        @RequestMapping(value="/reload-index")
public void reload()
        Reloads the search index. Warning: The search index will be unavailable for the duration of the process Should take approximately 1.5 hours with the given Data (RecordR-Data.sql) Note: Before adding Notes to the index, was under 5 minutes. Needing to join tables slows it down significantly
